title: Number of hospitals in Finland 2007 to 2017
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of hospitals, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2014 to 2007.
Differently, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2017 to 2015.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2015 to 2014.
gold: The number of hospitals in Finland was down at the lowest point of the observed period in 2017 , when there were 247 hospitals . At the beginning of the observed period , in 2007 , the number of hospitals amounted to 325 .
